concept.title: Shopping Cart Price Rule Support
concept.abstract: Staff users can define a discounted price for items that are purchased when other items are present in the Shopping Cart. Portal and public users can receive beneficial pricing for additional items as long as they purchase those items along with the item that initiates the discount. For example, every customer purchasing a Gold Membership, or enrolling in a specific course, will receive a discount on the related event for Gold Members or the course's related textbooks.

conbody.p:
The system calculates the correct price rule to apply based on:
the items identified in the Sales Order Lines and present on the Sales Order and in the Shopping Cart
when the Sales Order Line quantity is updated
when an item is deleted from the Shopping Cart

If a customer receives beneficial pricing on an event for Gold Members, but a staff user deletes the Gold Membership Sales Order Line from the Sales Order, the price on the event will adjust accordingly. The system responds similarly if the customer deletes the Gold Membership from the Shopping Cart.
Create a price rule on the item requiring price rule support.
